EmailTemplate.description: To request a CMA Case closure. To be sent to reports@isyscm.com
EmailTemplate.name: Closure Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Closure Request: {!Case.Employee__c}, # {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Attn: Reports
Please close the above case. Once completed please confirm with an email back to admin, CM, and supervisors.
Thank you.
